title: CommonsDB Metadata Schema 0.1.0
description: JSON Schema for CommonsDB metadata declarations.

signature.description: Base64-encoded or hex-encoded digital signature over the declaration data.

tsaSignature.description: Timestamp authority signature over a hash or document, typically RFC 3161-compliant.

declarationID.description: Unique identifier for the declaration, expressed as a CIDv1 derived from the canonicalised JSON-LD representation of the declaration record.

iscc.description: An ISCC-CODE in canonical representation. This is the minimal required field for a valid ISCC Metadata object.
iscc.x-explanation: Unique identifier for the media asset generated by the ISCC Generator.

name.description: A name given to the resource.

mediatype.description: Media type typically expressed using a MIME format (see IANA site and MDN reference), e.g. application/zip, audio/mpeg.
mediatype.x-explanation: Media type of the declared content (MIME type).

mode.description: The perceptual mode used to create the ISCC-CODE.

thumbnail.description: A thumbnail image relevant to the Thing.
thumbnail.x-explanation: Base64-encoded image embedded as a Data URI, typically a small preview of the original content.

redirect.description: A URL where users should be directed.

Location.x-explanation: The location where the resource can be obtained or the identifier of the resource.

original.description: The signee of the declaring transaction claims to be the original creator of the work manifested by the identified digital content.
original.x-explanation: Indicates whether the declaring party claims to be the original creator or rightsholder of the content.

schemaVersion.description: Indicates (by URL or string) a particular version of a schema used in some CreativeWork.
schemaVersion.x-explanation: Version of the declaration or metadata schema.

entryID.description: Unique identifier for the entry from the declaring party, could be a UUID.

supersedes.description: A related resource that is supplanted, displaced, or superseded by the described resource.
supersedes.x-explanation: Indicates that this declaration supersedes a previous one by referencing its canonical CIDv1.

timestamp.description: Generation is the completion of production of a new entity by an activity. This entity did not exist before generation and becomes available for usage after this generation.

declarerDid.description: Decentralised identifier for the person or system making the declaration.

regId.description: Identifier of the registry instance in which the declaration is stored.

declarationIdVersion.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified resource.

certificates.description: A Base64-encoded X.509 certificate used to verify the declaration signature.

x5cHeader.description: Base64-encoded certificate from the JWS x5c header field.

proof.description: A proof set is useful when the same data needs to be secured by multiple entities, represented by associating a set of proofs with the proof key in a document.

issuer.x-explanation: Identifier of the credential issuer, typically a DID.

validFrom.x-explanation: Start time when the credential becomes valid.

credentialSchema.x-explanation: External schema(s) defining the structure of the credential.

credentialSubject.x-explanation: The credentialSubject is a set of objects describing the subject(s) of claims; may include an id property.

rightsStatement.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.
rightsStatement.x-explanation: Machine-readable statement indicating the copyright and reuse status of a Work.

location.x-explanation: Reference URL for the page where the work is presented.

creationDate.description: Date of creation of the resource.
creationDate.x-explanation: Date on which the Work was created.

pdRationale.description: Rationale for determination that a Work is in the Public Domain.

creator.description: An entity responsible for making the resource.

attributionString.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
attributionString.x-explanation: A text statement identifying the copyright owner and specifying the required credit under an attribution licence.

steward.description: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer.
steward.x-explanation: Name of the person or organisation making the Work available, if different from the Declaring Party.
